product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Platinum Wahine Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: A stable board for flatwater and light surf, the women's Bic Sport ACE-TEC Platinum Wahine 10' 6" Stand Up Paddleboard lets you get out on the water to explore and get some exercise. 10 ft. 6 in. length maneuvers well in light surf and cruises swiftly in flatwater. Balanced rocker design and longboard-style outline offer excellent handling on flatwater and easy maneuverability in waves and light surf. EPS foam core wrapped with an epoxy resin/fiberglass cloth is encased in a styrene polymer outer shell; construction offers lightweight durability. Multiaxial fiberglass cloth distributes weight in multiple directions in the board, offering excellent stiffness and low weight. Padded deck supplies reliable wax-free traction when paddling in the standing or kneeling position, and it increases comfort on long paddles. 10 in. single fin and 2 side fins promote straight tracking in the water. FCS fin features injection-molded construction and a specialized structure on the inside face of the fin that reduces drag and enhances performance. Carry handle allows you to curve fingers inside for easy grip; the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Platinum Wahine 10 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard weights 26 lbs.
short_description: A stable board for flatwater and light surf, the women's Bic Sport ACE-TEC Platinum Wahine 10' 6" Stand Up Paddleboard lets you get out on the water to explore and get some exercise.
